title: 3 Days After Rajouri Terror Ambush, J&K Ex-Policeman Shot Dead Inside Mosque; 2nd Cop Attack In Dec | Hindustan Times
text: Explore Search Sunday, Dec 24, 2023 New Delhi o C Games E-Paper Sign in My Account Start 14 Days Free Trial Subscribe Enjoy unlimited access Subscribe Now! Get features like Ad lite A Minimal Ad Experience HT Premium Articles Expertly crafted articles Quickreads Segment News brief in summary format HT E-paper Access digital news experience Start 14 Days Free Trial Home Latest News Cricket Education India World Cities Entertainment Lifestyle Astrology Editorials Shop Now 2024 Planner Live Score HT Premium HTCity videos Photos Trending Web Stories Tech Business Sports Delhi News Mumbai News Bengaluru News Quickreads Daily Digest Following IPL Games + 7 more Mumbai News Bengaluru News Quickreads Daily Digest Following IPL Games News / Videos / News / 3 Days After Rajouri Terror Ambush, J&K Ex-Policeman Shot Dead Inside Mosque; 2nd Cop Attack In Dec 3 Days After Rajouri Terror Ambush, J&K Ex-Policeman Shot Dead Inside Mosque; 2nd Cop Attack In Dec news Published on Dec 24, 2023 01:15 PM IST Follow Us Follow Us Share Via Copy Link A retired J&K Superintendent of Police, Mohammed Shafi, was shot dead by terrorists in Baramulla district on December 24. The incident took place when a former J&K police officer was praying azan at a mosque in the Gantmulla area. J&K police, in a post, said the Shafi succumbed to injuries. The area has been cordoned off to nab the terrorists. The attack came two days after three J&K civilians who were taken for questioning following the December 21 terror attack on the Army were found dead.
